title: China Evergrande EV Unit cash strapped

The post China Evergrande EV Unit cash strapped appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
On Sept 24, China Evergrande’s electric vehicle unit said it was still looking for new investors and asset sales, without which it would struggle to pay salaries to employees and cover other expenses. Reuters was on average two minutes ahead on all six key alerts.Â
